oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Farmāns] : manuscript, 1910?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aga Khan , 1877-1957
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to a note on p. 1, contains farmāns made by Imām Sulṭān Muḥammad Shāh [Aga Khan III] at Zanzibar, Bagamoyo and Dar es Salaam. The manuscript records those farmāns made between 19 Jeṭh [Jyeshtha] to 23 Bhadr [Bhadrapad] s. 1956 (approx. May-September 1899).
Local paper. Pages generally in good condition, though slightly brittle; binding disintegrating.
Written in black ink, 13-14 lines per page.
Pamphlet binding in poor condition; single section sewn through fold, leather guards on inside fold. Lacks covers.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: South Asian literature
Religious literature, Indic
Ismaili literature
